articles.author: Chris Packham
articles.title: Saturday Citations: Leaky continental plates, talking monkeys and a spectacular Einstein ring - Phys.org
articles.description: This week, researchers reported on nine rivers and lakes in the Americas that defy hydrologic expectations. Geologists report that Earth's first crust probably had chemical features similar to today's continental crust. And engineers advanced quantum technolo…
